医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
电噪声刺激可提高大脑兴奋性较低的人的数学技能萨里大学、牛津大学、拉夫堡大学和荷兰拉德堡德大学的一项新研究表明，使用电噪声刺激刺激大脑区域可以帮助那些在数学问题上遇到困难的人提高数学学习能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Electrical-noise-stimulation-boosts-math-skills-in-individuals-with-lower-brain-excitability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Electrical-noise-stimulation-boosts-math-skills-in-individuals-with-lower-brain-excitability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3aa50b8-01fa-412c-95eb-ce8d2c64b92d Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:53:44 -0400 Electrical noise stimulation boosts math skills in individuals with lower brain excitability
研究探讨了数字媒体使用与年轻人精神病经历之间的关联加拿大的年轻人平均每天花几个小时在智能手机上。许多人从 TikTok 跳到 Netflix 再到 Instagram，放下手机只是为了拿起视频游戏控制器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-explores-associations- Between-digital-media-use-and-psychotic-experiences-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-explores-associations- Between-digital-media-use-and-psychotic-experiences-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5a741a7-76b4-414f-940b-793008610d5f Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:45:45 -0400 Study explores associations between digital media use and psychotic experiences in young adults
婴儿配方奶粉中的 MFGM 补充剂与长期认知益处相关母乳被广泛认为是对婴儿最有益的营养，但许多家庭在母乳喂养方面面临医疗或后勤方面的挑战。根据疾病控制中心的数据，在美国，只有 45% 的婴儿在 3 个月大时继续纯母乳喂养。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/MFGM-supplement-in-infant-formula-linked-to-long-term-cognitive-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/MFGM-supplement-in-infant-formula-linked-to-long-term-cognitive-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d391d21-f4b1-4783-b0a8-dbb45e2cb9d5 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:27:10 -0400 MFGM supplement in infant formula linked to long-term cognitive benefits
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：您应该认识的 3 位健康政策专家在本期特别节目中，KFF 健康新闻驻华盛顿首席记者朱莉·罗夫纳 (Julie Rovner) 采访了三位著名的卫生政策专家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-3-health-policy-experts-you-should-know.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-3-health-policy-experts-you-should-know.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e71d4ec-ad12-450f-97b5-4e88bd88287d Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:17:59 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What The Health?': 3 health policy experts you should know
研究发现，大流行可能改变了婴儿的肠道微生物群一组发展心理学研究人员表示，在大流行中度过第一年大部分时间的婴儿肠道内的细菌类型比出生较早的婴儿要少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Pandemic-may-have-altered-gut-microbiome-of-infants-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Pandemic-may-have-altered-gut-microbiome-of-infants-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=702620db-6d06-442d-99db-94210f7c16a0 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:49:30 -0400 Pandemic may have altered gut microbiome of infants, study finds
最大的癫痫基因研究发现新的风险基因由国际抗癫痫联盟（International League Against Epilepsy）协调进行的此类最大规模的基因研究，其中包括 RCSI 医学与健康科学大学 FutureNeuro 的科学家，发现我们 DNA 中的特定变化会增加患癫痫的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Largest-genic-study-of-epilepsy-finds-new-risk-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Largest-genic-study-of-epilepsy-finds-new-risk-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747d8b1e-4929-43c6-91ee-1308f2d70b3b Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:41:14 -0400 Largest genetic study of epilepsy finds new risk genes
同伴提供的心理治疗对产后抑郁症有效麦克马斯特大学的研究人员表示，应该在临床实践中实施一种创新的护理模式，为新妈妈提供由其他也经历过产后抑郁症 (PPD) 的母亲提供的心理治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Peer-delivered-psychotherapy- effective-for-postpartum-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Peer-delivered-psychotherapy- effective-for-postpartum-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ac0cd1c-a1c6-4a5e-adb0-23de6ad3b192 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:27:09 -0400 Peer-delivered psychotherapy effective for postpartum depression
抗氧化剂刺激肺癌肿瘤中新血管的形成卡罗林斯卡学院在《临床研究杂志》上发表的一项新研究表明，维生素 C 和其他抗氧化剂可刺激肺癌肿瘤中新血管的形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Antioxyants-stimulate-the-formation-of-new-blood-vessels-in-lung-cancer-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Antioxidants-stimulate-the-formation-of-new-blood-vessels-in-lung-cancer-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e02be042-1772-4ecc-98bf-3f087aee655d Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:18:59 -0400 Antioxidants stimulate the formation of new blood vessels in lung cancer tumors
新型液体活检技术利用RNA“暗物质”检测癌症癌症在早期阶段是最容易治疗的，因此寻找创新和非侵入性的方法来早期诊断癌症对于对抗这种疾病至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/New-liquid-biopsy-technology-uses-RNA-dark-matter-to-detect-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/New-liquid-biopsy-technology-uses-RNA-dark-matter-to-detect-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9b34637-e9ea-46dc-9509-9feb6b48dd48 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:08:50 -0400 New liquid biopsy technology uses RNA "dark matter" to detect cancer
研究发现急救人员的非人化与倦怠之间存在联系从奋战在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行前线的医疗专业人员到营救毛伊岛野火受害者的消防员，急救人员常常被誉为英雄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-finds-link- Between-dehumanization-and-burnout-in-first-responders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-finds-link- Between-dehumanization-and-burnout-in-first-responders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=047ae1d8-5dca-4c12-b6cf-aaf260f0b7ae Thu, 31 Aug 2023 13:52:31 -0400 Study finds link between dehumanization and burnout in first responders
